overview:
Allan is a fan of technology based start-ups and spends most of his time studying these kind of companies and developing his own projects.

Allan’s educational background is business administration and economics in which he is currently doing his PhD on stock market behaviorism. He will graduate in 2014.

Most important part of his professional career he spent in one of the biggest business consultation companies in Estonia called Advisio Ltd. For three years he was active in business and R&D project consulting. Major clients included Webmedia and Helmes who are the biggest IT-companies in Estonia. For two years he was a member of the board and active in consulting team management.

Currently Allan is working as a private investor focusing mostly on promising technology start-ups and developed technology companies. He is self-employed and spending most of the time studying business models, technologies and people behind businesses.

During his free time he spends time reading books about finance and stock markets, technology magazines, playing poker and doing some sports. Allan became second in the World Championship of Online Poker (2010 autumn) playing under the name Tutanhamon1.
